text: Venirauto Industrias C.A. is a Venezuelan automobile manufacturing company.d’Auto (niederländisch, abgerufen am 26. November 2016) == History == Venirauto was founded on November 3, 2006 in Maracay.Angaben des Unternehmens zum Präsidenten (spanisch, abgerufen am 26. November 2016) It is related to Iran Khodro and SAIPA from Iran. The productionAngaben des Unternehmens zur Gründung (spanisch, abgerufen am 26. November 2016) of automobiles started in 2007. The brand name is Venirauto. At the beginning of 2012, 470 people were employed.Angaben des Unternehmens (spanisch, abgerufen am 26. November 2016) == Vehicles == As of November 2016, the lineup consisted of the passenger car models Turpial and Centauro. Both were already introduced in 2007. It offers a four cylinder engine with 1323 cm³ and .Conozca los pasos para adquirir vía internet los vehículos marca Chery y Venirauto (spanisch, abgerufen am 26. November 2016) The wheelbase of the Turpial is 2345 mm, the length is 3935 mm and the height is 1455 mm. The vehicle is 4935 mm long and 1460 mm high. The curb weight is given as 1285 kg. == Production figures == In 2011, 3773 cars were built.Venirauto Industrias estima fabricar 8.000 vehículos en 2012 Vom 11. Januar 2012. (spanisch, abgerufen am 26. November 2016) For 2012, 8,000 vehicles were planned. On June 20, 2015, the then President Francisco Espinoza celebrated the completion of vehicle number 20,000. == References == == External links == Category:Car manufacturers of Venezuela Category:Government- owned companies of Venezuela Category:Vehicle manufacturing companies established in 2006 Category:2006 establishments in Venezuela Category:Iran–Venezuela relations
